wikitext.*:
'''Ponórir''' was the name of the northern portion of the [[Great Lands]], later known as [[wikipedia:Scandinavia|Scandinavia]] (with '''Ponórë''' being the [[Qenya]] name for [[wikipedia:Norway|Norway]]), according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] associated with ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.<ref name="Pon">{{PE|12}}, pp. 74-5</ref> 

== Etymology ==
The name ''Ponórir'' is in [[Qenya]], glossed as "the Northlands, Scandinavia" in the ''[[Qenya Lexicon]]'',<ref name="Pon"/> a combination of the root [[PO]] (associated with the north) + ''[[nórë]]'' ("land").<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Paul Strack]]|articleurl=http://eldamo.org/content/words/word-2222726187.html|articlename=ᴱQ. ''Ponórir'' loc.|website=Eldamo|accessed=29 April 2022}}</ref>
